title: Update website URL from draft deployment

requirements.text: Update the deployment URL configuration to change from the current draft website URL to a new custom URL or production domain

quotes: can i change the url from the draft website

acceptanceCriteria: The website is accessible via the new custom URL
All internal links and references point to the new URL
The old draft URL redirects to the new URL or is decommissioned

constraints: Maintain all existing functionality during URL migration
Ensure Internet Identity authentication continues to work with the new URL
nonGoals: Changing the application's visual design or branding
